descriptionHtml:
just messing around with a few conjuration spells that summon npc/monsters nothing balanced or anything magicka wise.

==Details===

Summon Orc Boss
Summon Master Necro
Summon Vampire Boss
Summon Snowy Sabre Cat
Summon Frostbite Spider
Summon Dwarven Centurion
Summon Spriggan Matron
Summon Skeletal Dragon
Summon Werewolf
== new=
Summon Frost Troll
Summon Ice Wraith
Summon Giant

u can buy all of these at dragon reach mage merchant.

===change Log===
0.02- changed a spell tome which was misspelled now corrected
added 3 new spells details at top. 

==installation==
just copy the .esp into your skyrim/data folder. If u have the previous version just remove/replace it.

there may be some compatibility with other summoning mods so this is just for fun messing around just to see if i could mess with some summoning stuff.

freel free to use this in any way just give me credits for it.
author: nikonz
